description: This is a modified version of the original app by Brian Krische.  I'd like to thank him for open sourcing the code so that it could be made available for the beautiful HP Pre3 screen resolution of 480x800.  Enjoy the stunning photographs from www.interfacelift.com now and set them as your wallpaper.  Mark your favorites to quickly access later.  There was some issue with the artists/tags categories so they are turned off for now, but I'll submit an update once I get them resolved.
